plantManager.pillar1Desc: Get everyone on the same page - no more silos or scattered systems. Our solutions help you track maintenance, reliability, and execution in one place so your team moves faster.

plantManager.processStepsTitle: From first call to full rollout - we’ve got you covered
plantManager.step1Title: We’ll get to know your plant
plantManager.step1Desc: Schedule a quick call so we can understand your processes, challenges, and team structure. We’ll walk you through how Tractian fits into your day-to-day and highlight where you’ll see the fastest wins and ROI.
plantManager.step2Desc: Bring in your key stakeholders for a hands-on demo aligned with your priorities. We’ll share relevant use cases from similar operations and show exactly how your team can benefit.
plantManager.step3Title: We’ll build a business case and ROI analysis
plantManager.step3Desc: We’ll outline ROI projections and cost justification based on your goals. Meanwhile, our engineers will ensure seamless connectivity, security, and integration with your current systems.
plantManager.step4Title: We’ll deploy, train, and go live
plantManager.step4Desc: Our engineers will roll out Tractian to your team with white-glove support, field training, and no disruption to operations. From day one, you’ll start tracking value and scaling adoption without friction.
plantManager.faq1Q: How can I reduce unplanned downtime at my plant?
plantManager.faq1A: Tractian <link>condition monitoring</link> detects early-stage failures and sends alerts before breakdowns happen - giving you time to act. Combined with our CMMS, those alerts automatically generate work orders, assign tasks, and track progress, so nothing slips through the cracks. You prevent failures and stay organized while doing it.
plantManager.faq2Q: Can I prove ROI using Tractian?
plantManager.faq2A: Yes, easily. Tractian gives you the data you need to show clear ROI through reduced unplanned downtime, lower maintenance costs (by avoiding costly emergency repairs), and longer asset life. Our insights help you quantify financial impact and optimize operational efficiency.
plantManager.faq3Q: How hard is it to install and start using Tractian?
plantManager.faq3A: It's plug-and-play. Vibration sensors are installed in minutes, and our platform is intuitive - no complex onboarding or training required. Most teams are up and running within a day.
plantManager.faq4Q: Can Tractian really help if my team is understaffed?
plantManager.faq4A: Yes. Our condition monitoring pinpoints the issues, while the CMMS turns them into clear, actionable tasks. Together, they eliminate time spent digging through data, guessing priorities, or chasing paperwork. You get straight-to-the-point alerts, smart scheduling, and full visibility so your team can act fast - even with fewer hands.
plantManager.faq5Q: Do I need to replace my current systems to use Tractian?
plantManager.faq5A: No. Tractian is designed to work alongside your existing tools, including ERPs, maintenance systems, and spreadsheets. You can start where you are and scale without disruption.
plantManager.faq6Q: How does Tractian support compliance and audit preparation?
plantManager.faq6A: Tractian builds compliance into everyday maintenance. It tracks safety validations, work permits, SOPs, and historical logs in one place - so you can instantly export reports and prove due diligence during audits or inspections.
plantManager.faq7Q: What kind of reporting does Tractian offer?
plantManager.faq7A: Tractian offers leadership-ready insights, including maintenance costs, backlog, execution rates, asset health, and labor productivity. Reports can be customized by area, timeframe, or asset type - and exported for planning or presentations.
plantManager.faq8Q: Is Tractian easy for technicians to use?
plantManager.faq8A: Yes. Tractian is mobile-first and built for the field. Tasks, checklists, and diagnostics are available in just a few taps - helping your team execute work orders, validate fixes, and stay productive without extra admin.
plantManager.faq9Q: What kind of support is included with Tractian?
plantManager.faq9A: You'll get full onboarding support, a dedicated account manager, and full access to our CAT-certified engineering team. Whether it's training, integration, or strategy, we're with you every step of the way.
plantManager.faq10Q: Can I use Tractian across multiple sites?
plantManager.faq10A: Absolutely. Tractian supports multi-site visibility out of the box. You can monitor performance across facilities, compare results, and standardize processes at scale.
plantManager.faq11Q: What types of machines or equipment does Tractian work with?
plantManager.faq11A: Tractian is designed to support a wide range of critical equipment - from motors and pumps to compressors and other industrial assets - whether they're modern or aging.
plantManager.faq12Q: Does Tractian require Wi-Fi or internal networks?
plantManager.faq12A: Tractian sensors use independent connectivity, so there's no need for internal network access or complex IT setup. Your data syncs automatically to our secure cloud platform. You can access the software from any desktop with internet access, or use the mobile app - even offline - right from the plant floor.
plantManager.faq13Q: Can Tractian help with standardizing processes across teams?
plantManager.faq13A: Yes. Tractian ensures repeatability with digital SOPs, safety tracking, and centralized documentation. It's easy to see what was done, when, and by whom across all shifts and teams.
plantManager.faq14Q: Can I migrate my existing maintenance data?
plantManager.faq14A: Yes. We provide easy data migration tools and hands-on support to bring in your historical records from Excel, ERP, CMMS, or other systems. You won't lose your legacy data.
plantManager.faq15Q: Does Tractian integrate with my existing tools?
plantManager.faq15A: Yes. We offer integrations with ERPs and support custom workflows through our open API. We also provide free migration from your current CMMS, along with easy-to-use tools to import data from Excel or other file formats.
plantManager.faq16A: Yes. Tractian meets key security and quality standards including SOC 2, ISO 27001, and ISO 9001. Our platform supports Single Sign-On (SSO), multi-factor authentication (MFA), and role-based access controls to protect your data and ensure only authorized users can access it. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. Visit our Trust Center for more details.
plantManager.faq17A: With our Bundled plan, which combines condition monitoring sensors and maintenance management software, pricing depends on the size and complexity of your operation. We work with you to build a custom proposal based on your needs, with no hidden costs. Everything you need is included in one integrated package.
plantManager.faq18Q: Is Tractian only for Plant Managers?
plantManager.faq18A: No. Tractian is designed for anyone responsible for keeping the plant running. That includes maintenance technicians, plant engineers, reliability engineers, maintenance supervisors, and maintenance managers, among others.
